headline: Coinbase Broadens Beyond Crypto With Stock Trading And Prediction Markets
summary: Coinbase Global (NasdaqGS:COIN) has launched zero commission trading for US stocks and ETFs with 24/5 market access. The company is integrating trading directly into Yahoo Finance, allowing users to move from research to execution in a single interface. Coinbase is also expanding into prediction markets as an additional product line alongside its core crypto business. For investors watching Coinbase Global, the move puts a new spotlight on how the business is evolving beyond pure crypto...
